BTC.name: Bitcoin
BTC.description: Bitcoin (BTC) is a cryptocurrency . Users are able to generate BTC through the process of mining. Bitcoin has a current supply of 19,066,500. The last known price of Bitcoin is 23,625.06739305 USD and is down -15.53 over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 9530 active market(s) with $65,202,329,252.81 traded over the last 24 hours. More information can be found at https://bitcoin.org/.

XRP.name: XRP
XRP.description: XRP (XRP) is a cryptocurrency . XRP has a current supply of 99,989,535,142 with 48,343,101,197 in circulation. The last known price of XRP is 0.31870992 USD and is down -11.61 over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 737 active market(s) with $2,459,296,085.84 traded over the last 24 hours. More information can be found at https://xrpl.org/.
